channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inflation concerns trigger a market dip as new data shows impact of Trump tariffs in June
item.description: President Trump's trade war is beginning to impact the consumer price index.

item.title: Real estate mogul Barbara Corcoran shares the ‘crazy’ work perks she’s offered her team including a free Bentley, elephant rides, and ‘the wildest parties in town’
item.description: While other CEOs try to create the best business results with RTO mandates and mass layoffs, the 'Shark Tank' mogul’s "crazy" perks created loyalty th...

item.title: Americans spend $40 billion on their pets’ health care. Chewy has a plan to get more of their money
item.description: Americans adopted roughly 23 million pets during the pandemic, and Bank of America Research sees the "COVID cohort" nearing middle age.

item.title: Coding has emerged as genAI’s killer use case. But what if its benefits are a mirage?
item.description: New research shows that coders vastly overestimated how much more efficient they were with AI help.

item.title: The attacks on Tim Cook are half-baked—despite Apple stumbling over AI
item.description: Under Tim Cook's leadership, Apple’s market value has soared from $350 billion in 2011 to more than $3 trillion today.
